ing: 2 cups macaroni or pasta of choice, uncooked
1 (10 ounce) can RED GOLDÂ® Petite Diced Tomatoes & Green Chilies, drained
des: "This amazingly cheesy and creamy mac-n-cheese gets a little spicy kick from our Petite Diced Tomatoes with Green Chilies. The best part is you don't have to 'cook' a thing! Pop all of the ingredients into your slow cooker and set on low for a truly satisfying pasta dish everyone will love!"
ins:
Place the uncooked pasta in the bottom of a 3.5 quart slow cooker that has been sprayed with cooking spray. Add the remaining ingredients, except tomatoes, to the slow cooker and stir until well combined. Cook on LOW for 4 hours.
Just before serving add tomatoes; stir to combine.
